attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for an elected politician, at any level, to lie to the houses of parliament or to other members of an elected chamber, or to the electorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is time for the political leaders of our nation to be properly accountable for their actions whilst in power. Lying to the House of Commons, or to a council meeting, or to the public when speaking as an elected representative is not acceptable. Those found guilty of misrepresentation, including propaganda, should be removed from office and compelled to repay salaries and expenses, and to lose pension rights  as well as being disqualified from holding office in the future. 
Surely no politician can disagree with this, unless of course, he or she has something to hide.
